#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
const ll MOD = 1e9+7;

inline ll fmod(ll x) {
    return x%MOD;
}

int main() {
    ll d[100001];
    d[0] = 1;
    d[1] = 0;

    for (int i = 2; i < 100001; ++i) {
        d[i] = fmod((i-1)*(d[i-1]+d[i-2]));
    }

    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while (t--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);

        printf("%lld\n",d[n]);
    }

    return 0;
}
